attributes.action: Cyclists for right of way priority on UK roads
attributes.additional_details:
This petiton is a campaign to the UK government to Issue right of way priority for cyclists on UK roads.

Some of the positive effects for right of way priority,

Safer roads to cycle on.
Improve public health.
Reduce congestion of streets.
Lighten the burden on public transport.
Less wear on roads.
Streets and cities more pleasant places.
Provide independence for children.




https://www.facebook.com/CyclistsForRightOfWayUK
